     <h1>

       Encompass Search Tips &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

         <!--labels to help with accessibility -->
         <label for="searchs" style="display:none;">
          Search Text
         </label>
         <label for="what" style="display:none;">
          Search Type
         </label>
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
          <tr>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_label" class="lgsearch_item">
             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_field" class="lgsearch_item">
             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />
             &nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_dropdown" class="lgsearch_item">
             <select id="what" name="what" class="dropdownform" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;">

               This Guide
              </option>
              <option value="/search.php?iid=3322&amp;gid=0&amp;c=0&amp;search=">
               All Guides
              </option>
             </select>
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_button" class="lgsearch_item" style="padding-right:2px;">
             <button dojotype="dijit.form.Button" type="button" name="fb" onclick="customSearch();" style="font-size:10px;">
              Search
             </button>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </form>
       </td>
      </tr>
     </table>
    </div>
    <div id="commentslistp5618318" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21120852">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21120852">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21120852">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Having trouble finding what you need from Encompass Search? Try:
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21120852">
          <ul>
           <li>
            Place titles or other phrases in quotation marks to search your exact phrase (e.g.,
            <em>
             "catcher in the rye"
            </em>
            ).
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            If you get too many results, try adding the author's name in your revised search (e.g.,
            <em>
             "complete poems" AND "emily dickinson"
            </em>
            ).
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            Capitalize AND and OR to distinguish these search term connectors from your search terms (e.g.,
            <em>
             heart OR cardiac
            </em>
            ).
           </li>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Use AND to search for items that contain both of your terms.
            </li>
            <li>
             Use OR to search for items that contain either of your terms.
             <br />
             <br />
            </li>
           </ul>
           <li>
            Limit results by clicking the checkboxes on the left sidebar of your search results (e.g., choose
            <em>
             DVD
            </em>
            on the left if you want the DVD format of Jane Austen's
            <em>
             Pride and Prejudice
            </em>
            ).
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            Items available to Muhlenberg College users are labeled
            <em>
             Held by: Muhlenberg College Trexler Library
            </em>
            . Items without a
            <em>
             Held by
            </em>
            label are not in Muhlenberg College's collection.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            Most items not owned by Muhlenberg College can be requested on interlibrary loan. Click on the
            <em>
             Request Item
            </em>
            button.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt21120852" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5618318" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>

           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Get help:
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21142952">
          <p>
           Need more help with this?&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/ask-a-librarian.html">
            Ask a Librarian
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21142952" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
